name: Rita Sweet
review: Superb app! The rates are live and real time and the charting is very good.Supports major Indian markets along with FnO too!

name: Josh Booth
review: A very powerful platform for users who want a real guide. It has always been easy here and it is helping me a great deal!

name: Terry Watson
review: A reliable app and highly trustworthy. No one should avoid taking benefit from such a great service! Designed for speed and comfort!
